title: The apologye of syr Thomas More knyght
author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.
publisher: Prynted by w. Rastell in Fletestrete in saynte Brydys chyrch yarde,
notes: A reply to: Saint German, Christopher.  A treatise concernynge the division betwene the spirytualtie and temporaltie.
With five final errata leaves; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
